com.mcc.ul
Class UsbConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.UsbConfig

public class UsbConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to get or set configuration of a USB DAQ device. To create an instance of this class, call the getUsbConfig() method of the DaqDeviceConfig class.

Method Summary
 boolean hasExclusiveAccess()
          Returns true when the USB interface was successfully claimed.

          Sets exclusive access to a USB interface.
